title: Can i include my heloc with a chapter 13
question: I am currently in a home loan mod trial period for the first mortgage. If I file for chapter 13, can I include my heloc. this would allow me to be able to make my first mortgage payments.
answers:
If your home is worth less than what you owe on the first mortgage, then a Chapter 13 allows you to remove the second mortgage so it no longer encumbers the house. It is then turned into unsecured debts that is treated just like any other of your unsecured debts. It is a valuation issue, and an appraisal will be necessary.

Chapter 13 cases, and 'lien stripping' (removing the second mortgage from the home) can be very complex. You should seek assistance of an attorney in your area to find out more.

Good luck!
